articles.author: Fred Lambert
articles.title: Tesla’s freefall in Europe continues as BYD overtakes it at stunning pace - Electrek
articles.description: Tesla’s sales freefall in Europe continues. The American automaker’s sales declined by 40% in July, while BYD’s increased by 225%....
articles.content:
Teslas sales freefall in Europe continues. The American automakers sales declined by 40% in July, while BYDs increased by 225%.
The European Automobile Manufacturers Association (ACEA) released auto… [+8022 chars]
